titleStmt.title: SII 13.236: original edition by G.V. Srinivasa Rao
No. 236. (A.R. No. 370 of 1924.) ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE SAME SHRINE.

summary.p: This inscription states that under orders of Aḍigaḷ Paḻavēṭṭaraiyar Maṟavaṉ Kaṇḍaṉār, the temple authorities assigned 124 vēli of dēvadāna land at Paśuṅguḷam in Virai-kūṟṟam on permanent tenancy lease to Vēṭṭakkuḍaiyāṉ Gōvindaṉ Kaḍambaṉ of Poygaikkuṟuviḍam, on condition that he should measure out 2880 kalam of paddy every year to the temple at the rate of 120 kalam for every vēli. Evidently a record of Sundara-Chōḷa.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . koIrājakecaripanmarkku yāṇṭu 10 2Āvati netirāmāṇṭu kuṉṟakkūṟṟattu devadā
ṉam Avaṉikandharvva Īśvarahṛhattu devakanmikaḷomum patipātamulattomum paṭṭuṭai yomum
camaiyattomu maṟṟum Ittaḷi paṅkuṭaiyom Epperppaṭṭomum Aṭikaḷ paḻaveṭṭaraiyar maṟavaṉ
kaṇṭanār Aruḷicceyyum poykaikkuṟuviṭattu veṭṭakkuṭaiyāṉ kovin=taṉ kaṭampa ṉukku kuṭinikkā deva
tāṉamāka cantrātittavaṟ kāṇiceytu kuṭutta nilam Ittaḷi tevadānam viṟaikkūṟṟattu pacuṅkuḷattūr veṭṭap peṟuṉap
pa nilam Irupattunāl veliyālum veli nūṟṟirupatiṉkalam kāṇikkaṭaṉāka vaṉta nellu Iraṇṭāyirattu Eṇṇūṟṟu E
ṇpatiṉ kalamum tiruvaiyāṟaṉoṭokku marakkālāl kār pātiyum picāṉam pātiyum vāṭāk kaṭaṉ Eṅkaḷ taraviṉāleye pacuṅkuḷattu
ley Aḷappatākavu mivvūr viḷakkeṇṇaiccey muṉpu kalmel veṭṭiṉa nikki Uṇṇila moḻiviṉṟi vaḷaiyil cuṟṟu Uṭumpoṭi yāmaitava
ḻnta nilamuṟṟum kārāṇkiḻamai Uṭpaṭa ciṟṟiṟai ciṟupaṅkum Ivaṉey peṟuvatākavum vākkaḻañcum perumāḷ koḷḷil kovin=taṉ kaṭampaṉe
y vaiccuk koḷḷap peṟuvatākavum cāsaṉam peṟṟuṭaiyār peṟuvatellām peṟuvatāka vum Ipparicu cantrātittavat kuṭinikkā devadāṉamākak kāṇi
ceytu kuṭuttom veṭṭakkuṭaiyāṉ kovintaṉ kaṭampaṉukku devakanmikaḷomum patipāta mulattomum paṭṭuṭaiyomum camaiyattomu maṟṟum Ittaḷi paṅkuṭai
yomum Ivarkaḷ paṇikka Eḻutiṉe ṉivvūr madhyastaṉ Eṟaṉ maḻavāṭiyāṉa brahmapriyaneṉ Ivai Eṉ Eḻuttu ..
Digital edition of SII 13.236 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
